projects.title: API Link Shortener
projects.description: A responsive website built with React hooks, styled with Sass. It has a mobile menu that functions using the useState & useEffect hooks. * I am currently developing the functionality to output API data from the user's input in a link card below using the axios libary. I also need to complete user input server side validation functionality.

projects.title: Fylo Email Validation
projects.description: A responsive landing page built using Sass with React functional components. This was the first time I used sass features of variables and nesting. The project has email client side validation.

projects.title: Crypto Coin Checker
projects.description: A responsive React app styled in Sass, pulling data from 'coingecko's API via Axios based on user input. It also uses conditional rendering to display the daily percentage change value in either green or red based on either an increase or decrease.
